name: Rahul Gupta
body: Hello, I'm Rahul Gupta, a professional blogger, coder and a digital marketer too. I'm a 21 years old guy who love to be called as a tech geek. Currently I'm working as an senior editor for [CrunchyTricks](http://www.crunchytricks.com) and contributing to [6sdigital](http://6sdigital.com) through my digital marketing skills.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
